info_1.name: Sysup Bootstrap Warning
info_1.info: If updating from 19.04 or older: The first system update will fail during the self-update of `sysup`. Simply restart the system update and it will work fine after that.

pre_1.name: Qt4 Pre-Update Removal
pre_1.info: If updating from an 18.12 version: The Qt4 packages are causing `pkg` to crash due to being removed upstream.

pre_2.name: [CRITICAL] Sysup Bootstrap Configuration
pre_2.info: If updating from 19.05 or older: The 'bootstrap' configuration lines in /usr/local/etc/sysup.json need to be removed before starting the update. Failure to do this will result in an unusable system post-update.

pre_2.name: Sysup Bootstrap Configuration
pre_2.info: If updating from 19.05 or older: The 'bootstrap' configuration lines in /usr/local/etc/sysup.json need to be removed before starting the update. Failure to do this will result in an unusable system post-update.
